Reviews.Title: EASY BREEZY!!
Reviews.Author: slippersister "slippersister"
Reviews.Content: I am far from being an electronic wizard so I was very concerned about being able to easily (a) take pictures (b) review, edit and delete pictures and (c) dump pictures from a card into my computer.  PLUS I wanted to do all of this with minimal manuial reading, downloading from the manufacturer and watching endless CD-ROMs and never getting the answers I needed.  If these, too, are your criteria, BUY THIS CAMERA RIGHT AWAY!  This camera is so easy to use and so user friendly, it's ridiculous!  Not only that but Amazon has the BEST deal on the internet and I was able to purchase a cute purple bundle w/a leather case and strap, memory card and camera for $100 LESS than my local Radio Shack (they didn't have the bundle, fyi).  The pictures are clear and crisp.  Honestly, my relatives ooh and aah over my candid snaps which are over-the-top charming and fun.  I love the confidence I have taking pictures that I KNOW are going to be excellent AND look cute and coordinated while doing it!  One negative remark is the fact that it takes a few seconds between pictures for the camera to re-set...a minus when you're trying to capture candid moments in succession.  But this is a minor quibble compared to how easy and wonderful this camera is to use!  EXCELLENT PURCHASE!

Reviews.Title: Beyond Adequate
Reviews.Author: Cassandra Ray
Reviews.Content: There have been many reviews that give this camera a less than satisfactory rating. The reasons range from the pictures being blurry to software problems. Well, I would like to tell you that I have no problems whatsoever. I worry that many people have trouble with blurry pictures because they fail to realize that you have to slightly depress the snap button in order to get it to focus. This is kind of a new idea, but I am a strong supporter for it. It allows YOU to have more control over what your picture will look like compared with earlier generations of cameras. The screen is BEAUTIFUL. The colors are very vibrant. I have taken videos and the video quality is definitely above normal quality, but the sound is what to write home about. The sound is crystal clear. The case here is normally like 50$ by itself, so you are practically getting the camera for a steal. I would recommend this to anyone who is an amateur photographer, who enjoys carrying around a camera all of the time but really wants good quality photos to reflect upon.

Reviews.Title: Great little pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Gaea
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent little point and shoot camera.  In addition to this little pocket cam, I also have a Cannon Rebel XTi.  As that camera is too big to carry around all the time, I often use this camera for friends' birthday parties, quick hikes, etc.  I have been surprised at the quality of photos this camera produces.  Occassionally, they are even better than the Rebel photos.  The touch screen is a great feature, and I like being able to scroll with the screen.  The memory card holds A TON of pictures.  I can go months without deleting.  The size is super convenient and fits in my pocket.  A few issues:  1 - You have to use your fingernail to scroll when using the touchscreen, it doesn't like finger tips.  Not sure that it would be of much use to someone with very short nails. 2 - I have not been able to figure out how to format the memory card from the camera.  I load all the photos to my computer, then delete the camera pics while I'm in the folder (on the comp).  3 - You have to charge using your computer or a USB port to wall converter.  There is no removable battery pack to charge (biggest drawback).  Overall, the value for the money can not be beat.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera - Great Value
Reviews.Author: ColoradoEngineer
Reviews.Content: Camera fit our needs to a tee.  Small, light weight, click and shoot movies and pics.  Good quality pics.  Synchs with iPhoto, no problem.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Lady Poetry
Reviews.Content: The service was quick and effecient and the camera and case etc arrived in good order. I love the camera itself but only a month after purchase i had to buy a new battery.the camera itself seems to be affecting the batteries because the replacement battery i bought will not charge now either. I am not happy with this product at all

Reviews.Title: Pictures turn out blurry
Reviews.Author: B. Lee
Reviews.Content: I'll put some samples here of some pictures I took that were in Auto mode that turned out blurry. It's a nice looking camera. It looks nice and sleek, but whats the point if it doesn't do what its suppose to do. I use to have a canon powershot and it took better pictures and upgraded to this. Even my camera phone takes better pictures. When I snap photo's, I only pray that they'll turn out good. I'm going to try to get rid of it on ebay.

Reviews.Title: Nice images
Reviews.Author: Mana
Reviews.Content: I loved the quality of images with this Nikon, but after about a year and a half it broke and would not turn on.

Reviews.Title: Terrible images..
Reviews.Author: Christine Callahan "Chrissy"
Reviews.Content: This camera sucks..I had such a hard time getting it to NOT be blurry or messed up. I just gave up and started using my Iphone and Ipad for pictures. They came out so much better then this thing.

Reviews.Title: my daughters camera
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: it is fast and it is accurate and it is stylish. my daughters camera and she likes the nikon camera.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: hd
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera after my college graduation, because I needed another small digital camera. I have a Nikon D80 SLR and a Nikon Coolpix S3 (which i've had for 5 years and has been amazing). I thought upgrading to this Nikon Coolpix S4100 would be better than my S3, but it's not much better. The pictures don't look any better than they did when taken on my S3. The touch screen is kind of annoying at times, and sometimes the screen will freeze up. I've noticed my pictures sometimes seem blurry, and the night mode is not as great as I thought it would be. It's light weight, easy to charge, and the 4GB SD card is awesome, but the case is ok, and the camera is ok. I would not buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great small camera - super pics Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Nikon lover
Reviews.Content: Super small camera that takes great pics.  Have many choices of quality of print (size of file) so great if want pics to email or pics to print.  Find the screen easy to use and follow.  Have not yet read the manual !!!  but find I can do most things.  Recharges very quickly too and the charge seems to last a long time.  Hard to miss at the price.

Reviews.Title: Thank you grandma
Reviews.Author: grandma
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my thirteen year old granddaughter. She immediatly responded on facebook with several pictures of herself, her puppy and her friends. "Thank you soooo much Grandma! I love my new PURPLE camera!" This camera was a hit.

Reviews.Title: Happy with this camera...love the color
Reviews.Author: Journey2010
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for 3 weeks and so far I like it for the price.  It's small, takes clear pictures, large screen size and cool color (plum).  At first I hesitated because of the reviews stating the screen was sensitive to touch but I'm happy I went ahead and purchased it.  I do not use my finger, I use the Stylus that comes with it and I attached the Stylus to my strap - perfect.  The only thing I would suggest you should practice changing the scenes so you can get the best picture possible at all times.  The default auto scene doesn't produce a flash everytime you need one so you will need to select a different scene to get your desired result.The only negative I have with this purchase is Amazon shipping delay.  I initially purchased the camera with the free shipping as I used the option in the past but this time my camera didn't ship in 5 days.  I ordered it on Monday and it still didn't ship by Friday and my money was deposited back into my account (assumed it was only a 3 day hold).  Amazon has never taken more then a couple days to ship a product that states in stock so I'm not sure what the problem was but I cancelled on Friday and reordered paying for shipping and I received the camera right away on Monday.  Shipping Scam huh...not sure but Amazon free shipping get's a negative for me on this purchase. Next time I will contact them directly if possible before paying for shipping when I should have recieved it free.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: we1shi
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in June and it is awesome! I would say that I use the camera on a daily basis and have had no problems with it. Its great for taking all kind of photos and it actually has some neat things you do with the photos after. I love that I can take a photo and then change it to black and white AND focus on one color i.e. I took a photo of my dog changed it to the black/white/one color option. The photo is all black and white apart from her red collar..pretty neat! I also love the touch screen. Its also a bargain at amazon...it was $189.99 at target!

Reviews.Title: poor photos-update
Reviews.Author: Trying to buy as little as possible
Reviews.Content: Had to replace a lost camera and bought this one.  It takes great photos.  Better than the Cannon Powershot SD1400 and Sony Cybershot. The only problem I would say is that the cable is so different from all other cables that you need a different one for each camera.  This is did not come with one that you can use for the computer so I had to purchase one from Ebay.Update after using it for about 6 months: pictures are very fuzzy. There is no need for the cable because you can take out the SD card and download the photos that way.  Will not buy another one like this.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: sacsmilesaver
Reviews.Content: Great camera. The camera was very easy to use. It came with instructions but I did not need them. It is a very user friendly camera- full of great options and toys. It is a great camera for the price. I am very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jsmith
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after reading good reviews and the price was right. Plus, it came with the SD card and case.  It was great for about 3 days... then it started to freeze. I took the battery out and replaced it, and it worked for a couple more days. Then the screen went GREEN! Yes, green. The reaction time for the touchscreen was ridiculous! It would not power down, so the lens stayed sticking out. The only positive that experience that I can say about this camera is that it takes quality fireworks shots, and I like to editing potential for the pictures. Those two things are not worth it, so I returned the camera today!  This might have been fluke camera, but I don't want to hassle with it again.

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: ginarn93
Reviews.Content: My daughter bought this camera to replace her old pentex and loved it. After using hers I had to have one! It takes very nice pictures, easy to use and portable!  I would recommend this camera if you need a reasonable camera and easy to use...for any age.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: dirtyrat
Reviews.Content: I received this gift as a Mother's Day gift.This bundle package was a great deal!!  I love purple (even thu it is like a berry color).I am still learning some of the functions that it has available.  But it is perfect even if you don't use the extras.  Was easy to do the inital set up, easy to use...point and shot.  Pictures are great quality and I have mine set for PC so once I down load them they are set to email with no compressing.  It is light weight and I keep it in my purse with me all of the time.  Always ready for a so called Kodak moment.I do recommend purchasing some screen protectors if you have any type of finger nails.  I find myself using my nails more than my finger.  I like to keep my screens scratch free so I do use protectors as a rule of thumb.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S4100
Reviews.Author: B. MacKinnon "brucevr6"
Reviews.Content: Great little camera. Pictures are sharp. Very clear and bright display. Intuitive and easy to use. Great for the purpose for which it was purchased...small, pocket sized point and shoot . Seems to be very good quality.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Jessica Fer
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy, I actually lost it in a trip but I am planning to buy the exact same one. Great pictures, great video, and best of all very easy to use. I would definitely recommend it. This would be my third Nikon and never changing.

Reviews.Title: Nikon coolpix better than advertised
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: This camera is even better than advertised. I love the touch screen. There are plenty of different settings for scenes. The color is clear and vivid. This is a great camera for a non-professional who wants to take great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S4100 14 MP Digital Camera with 3-Inch Touchscreen Display, SanDisk 4GB SD Memory Card, and Leather Case (Plum)
Reviews.Author: Patricia Mullane
Reviews.Content: I have a Nikon P500 and it's wonderful but obviously it's a bit large to just pop in your bag and go so I purchased this camera..love the size of it and it takes wonderful pictures...

Reviews.Title: It's wonderful
Reviews.Author: Jennytoocute
Reviews.Content: I love the camera, it takes great clear pictures, the touch screen is not complicated to use, the color helps distinguish it from other cameras, all in all it's a great investment.

Reviews.Title: super cool
Reviews.Author: patricia b barry "patti"
Reviews.Content: It was a gift and the person is very happy with the camera.  It is very easy to use. I would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Just perfect!
Reviews.Author: Debit "Me"
Reviews.Content: The camera is amazing! I absolutely love it! + in Walmart just the camera is $147. Here for $149 you receive a 4gb and a case. Great deal ;)

Reviews.Title: Sleek, easy to use, packed with features.
Reviews.Author: Santosh Nair
Reviews.Content: Very sleek camera, easy to understand functions, lot of good features - blink detection, autofocus, shake detection, etc.The touch screen is very smooth, easy to use.Images are very clear, 14 MP is enough for day to day use. HD video recording is great, again.. easy to use functions.Battery life is good .. Overall, a very good sensible camera for the average user.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: K. R. Halliday
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from a Canon Digital Camera with lower megapixals to this camera.  It is a basic point and shoot camera and does what I need it to do.  The zoom feature works well.  The only con is that the touch screen is a big hard to get used to.  It is not as responsive as a touchscreen cell phone.  I find myself using both my finger and the stylus (provided).  The stylus does not attach itself to the camera body, it is external and needs to be clipped to the camera strap which I find some what awkard.  I shopped around for case/camera/memory card combo's and this was one of the better deals I found for $149.  If you are looking for a camera to take average photographs then this a good investment.

Reviews.Title: This product is worst and customer support is bad
Reviews.Author: Kans
Reviews.Content: I ordered nikon coolpix s4100, i was able to take only two photos. After that I am getting the lens error message. My friend who bought nikon, waterproof binocular suggested this camera.. Oops my money should not be wasted. I hope nikon will resolve this.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX  S4100 Digital  Camera Gift Pack
Reviews.Author: Don the digital camera beginner
Reviews.Content: The package arrived OK, BUT the 4GB SD Memory Card was missing. I've been trying to contact AMAZON ever since, to try to get a new memory card, but CANNOT find a way to contact them- No phone number is available and all attempts at email cpntacts  FAILED. This seems like a deliberate attempt by AMAZON to discourage contacts. PLEASE SEnd ME THE MISSING 4GB SD Memory Card. Please NOTIFY ME me how  to contact AMAZON in the future in case I ever try to purchase anything from AMAZON again I would give a 5 ster rating except for my problems in trying to replace the missing memory card..

ProductInfo.Features:
14.0-megapixel CCD sensor for superb image quality
5x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom-NIKKOR Glass Lens
4-way VR Image Stabilization System
Touch Control 3-inch High Resolution (460,000-dot) Clear Color Display
EXPEED C2 for enhanced image quality and processing speed
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX S4100 14 MP Digital Camera with 3-Inch Touchscreen Display, SanDisk 4GB SD Memory Card, and Leather Case (Plum)
